description: Gets information about an action group for an agent.

parameters.name: actionGroupId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the action group for which to get information.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agent that the action group belongs to.

parameters.name: agentVersion
parameters.description: The version of the agent that the action group belongs to.

nested_items.name: agentActionGroup
nested_items.description: Contains details about the action group.

nested_items.name: actionGroupExecutor
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function containing the business logic that is carried out upon invoking the action or the custom control method for handling the information elicited from the user.

nested_items.name: customControl
nested_items.description: To return the action group invocation results directly in the InvokeAgent response, specify RETURN_CONTROL.

nested_items.name: lambda
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function containing the business logic that is carried out upon invoking the action.

nested_items.name: actionGroupId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the action group.

nested_items.name: actionGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the action group.

nested_items.name: actionGroupState
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the action group is available for the agent to invoke or not when sending an InvokeAgent request.

nested_items.name: agentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the agent to which the action group belongs.

nested_items.name: agentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the agent to which the action group belongs.

nested_items.name: apiSchema
nested_items.description: Contains either details about the S3 object containing the OpenAPI schema for the action group or the JSON or YAML-formatted payload defining the schema. For more information, see Action group OpenAPI schemas.

nested_items.name: payload
nested_items.description: The JSON or YAML-formatted payload defining the OpenAPI schema for the action group. For more information, see Action group OpenAPI schemas.

nested_items.name: s3BucketName
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: s3ObjectKey
nested_items.description: The S3 object key for the S3 resource.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure that the API request completes no more than one time. If this token matches a previous request, Amazon Bedrock ignores the request, but does not return an error. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the action group was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the action group.

nested_items.name: functionSchema
nested_items.description: Defines functions that each define parameters that the agent needs to invoke from the user. Each function represents an action in an action group.

nested_items.name: functions
nested_items.description: A list of functions that each define an action in the action group.
CreateAgentActionGroup request.
CreateAgentActionGroup response.
UpdateAgentActionGroup request.
UpdateAgentActionGroup response.
GetAgentActionGroup response.

nested_items.name: parentActionGroupSignatureParams
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for a computer use action.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: parentActionSignature
nested_items.description: If this field is set as AMAZON.UserInput, the agent can request the user for additional information when trying to complete a task. The description, apiSchema, and actionGroupExecutor fields must be blank for this action group.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the action group was last updated.
